english: She has a nice pair of pink gloves.
chinese: 她有一双漂亮的粉色手套。

english: It's traditional to eat moon cakes on mid-autum day in China.
chinese: 在中国中秋节吃月饼是传统习俗。

english: My mother will take me to the world park to learn about the famous places around the world tomorrow.
chinese: 我妈妈明天会带我去世界公园了解世界各地的著名景点。

english: Last summer vacation, I went to Beijing with my parents.
chinese: 去年暑假，我和父母去了北京。

english: We went to the science museum last Saturday.
chinese: 我们上周六去了科学博物馆。

english: When we cross the road, we must follow the traffic rules.
chinese: 当我们过马路时，必须遵守交通规则。

english: To keep safe, you can wait on the pavement and look out for cars and bikes.
chinese: 为了安全，你可以在人行道上等待，注意来往的汽车和自行车。

english: You must not play football on the road because there are many cars and bikes.
chinese: 你不能在路上踢足球，因为那里有很多汽车和自行车。

english: Let's meet at the bus stop at 8 o'clock.
chinese: 我们八点钟在公共汽车站见面吧。

english: Maybe you can ride a bike or take a bus instead of driving a car.
chinese: 也许你可以骑自行车或乘公共汽车而不是开车。
